control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined concealment and misdirection techniques] for [Assignment: organization-defined information systems] at [Assignment: organization-defined time periods] to confuse and mislead adversaries.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined techniques] to hide or conceal [Assignment: organization-defined information system components].
